text: A Bunny girl is a character that wears a "bunny suit" costume. The costume has a strapless corset teddy, bunny ears, black sheer-to-waist pantyhose, a bow tie, a collar, cuffs and a fluffy cottontail. The costume originated in Playboy clubs, as was the costume is inspired by the tuxedo-wearing playboy rabbit mascot. The outfit had gained some traction in Japan in which the outfit is simply called the "Bunny girl outfit", and the outfit can also be seen in some anime and manga titles. However, there is some decline. ==References== Category:Anime and manga terms
title: Bunny Girl
